>
[Enduring Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=5772) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 64 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You've learned how to make your personal energy last just a little bit longer when quickly brewing ad hoc concoctions. When using [Quick Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=667) to create an [alchemical tool](/Equipment.aspx?Category=6&Subcategory=10) or [elixir](/Equipment.aspx?Category=6&Subcategory=8), that tool or elixir remains potent until the end of your next turn, instead of losing its potency at the start of your next turn.
name: Enduring Alchemy
